entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 30%

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 700 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023
